sentences.sContent: Intelligence and cunning emanated from him.
sentences.sCn: 聪明和机灵从他身上散发出来。

remMethod.val: e (看作ex， 出) + man (流出) + ate (表示动词) → 流出

trans.tranCn: 流出， 发出； 发散， 放射
trans.tranOther: If a quality emanates from you, or if you emanate a quality, you give people a strong sense that you have that quality
